<Text: Auchterhouse Castle is a c. 13th century castle located northwest of Dundee, Angus, Scotland.>
Triplets:<Auchterhouse Castle
2:
--------------------
Text: Auchterhouse Castle:  The castle may have been in ownership of the Ramsay family, who were hereditary Sheriffs of Angus.
Triplets:<Auchterhouse Castle
3:
--------------------
Text: Auchterhouse Castle:  Sir William Wallace is alleged to have stayed at the castle and one its towers was named in his honour.
Triplets:<Auchterhouse Castle
5:
--------------------
Text: Auchterhouse Castle:  The castle came into the possession of James Erskine, 7th Earl of Buchan who may have built the 17th century tower house.
